summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganLive Tinted's multitasking HUESTICK Complexion Stick delivers longwearing, medium-to-full coverage with a soft, matte finish. Its skincare-packed formula blurs and smooths, with a lightweight, second-skin feel. And in 20 inclusive shades, there's a hue made just for you.
details: DetailsFeaturesBuildable, medium-to-full coverageLightweight, second-skin feelSupercharged with skincareBlurs + smooths skin with a soft matte finishMulti-functional + portable for quick touch-upsInclusive shade rangeKey IngredientsCeramides - Strengthen skin barrier and boost hydration.Squalane - Lightweight moisture that smooths skin.Hyaluronic Acid - Hydrates, soothes, and plumps skin.Vitamin C - Brightens, evens tone, and defends against free radicals.Goji Berries - Antioxidant-rich to moisturize skin and prevent dark spots.BenefitsFragrance FreeDermatologist TestedNon-comedogenicItem 2642814How To UseSwipe onto skin. Blend using your fingers or a brush.IngredientsIsononyl Isononanoate, Isoamyl Laurate, Phenylisopropyl Dimethicone, Phenyl Trimethicone, Synthetic Wax, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Silica, Dimethicone, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Ceramide NP, Squalane, Lycium Barbarum Seed Oil, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Oleic/Linoleic/Linolenic Polyglycerides, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sunflower Seed Oil Glycerides, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Methicone, Tin Oxide, Datem, Trihydroxystearin, Glucomannan. May Contain / Peut contenir (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Swipe onto skin. Blend using your fingers or a brush.
ingredients: Glucomannan. May Contain / Peut contenir (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Great base for a full face or a no makeup look

reviews.headline: Great product once you figure it out!
reviews.comments: The first few times I used this, I HATED it. I thought it was the worst product I had ever tried until I learned how to use it. First, this pills horribly under certain SPF's. I can't use this with Supergoop, only my La Roche-Posay mineral SPF works well under this. Second, if you apply too much this looks heavy, cakey, and insane. I have learned the hard way I only need 3-4 swipes to get good medium coverage. Less is more. I blend this out using a brush, and that's what works for me. If there are any areas that aren't blending well or that I need additional product, I use a finger and tap to blend or the product will start moving and smearing. Once I figured all these things out, I really do like this product. I'm 36, normal to dry skin, and this wears for almost the entire day before settling into my fine lines. The finish looks beautiful, very natural and skin-like. It's lightweight and feels like I'm not wearing anything. I like that it's a stick, easy to travel with, and the packaging is really heavy and great quality (cool magnetic cap too). Overall, this gets 4/5 because it shouldn't take so much trial and error to figure out how to use something. I prefer Ilia's stick foundation over this, but can't find my color match in that line. Also, if you have dry skin I don't think you would like this, I would stick with their skin tint.

reviews.headline: Love the smoothness and coverage but I have go a shade dark
reviews.comments: I have og a shade darker then what I chose because it's to bright.

reviews.headline: I would buy this 100 times over.
reviews.comments: Finally found a foundation that's actually neutral and not too orange. Make sure you prep skin before applying.

reviews.headline: Seamless, long lasting coverage
reviews.comments: I'm 45 and have neutral to dry skin (primarily dry on my cheeks), and this formula wears beautifully all day. It creates a "my skin but better" effect when worn over a hydrating primer. Both creams and powders blend nicely over the foundation. I really enjoy this one.

reviews.headline: i tried so hard to love it ðŸ˜­
reviews.comments: i got this about a week ago and ive tried to prep my skin in every way possible but it really just did not work for me!! it looks alright when i first apply it, but after a couple hours it separates and settles into my fine lines / pores. the shade range is kind of limited too, the lightest shade was too dark and orangey on my skin. it may just be user error but im definitely going to return this!!

reviews.headline: Your Skin But Better
reviews.comments: I love how lightweight it is! You don't need much to make it happen, but it's buildable if you need more coverage. I have a fair complexion with rosacea, so it's hard finding something that will matches my undertone without it being too thick. It leaves a more dewy look, so if you're looking for something more matte, I'd say you'd have to find a happy medium with your primer to balance it out. It's very moisturizing! It didn't leave my face feeling dry when I washed it off. I have big pores as well, and I felt that it didn't sit into them so much since I paired it with the La Roche Posay Matte Moisturizer and Good Molecules sunscreen. I might try a more pore minimizing primer to see if that will make any difference in the future.

reviews.headline: Not that great
reviews.comments: Bought this after seeing it on instagram.  Unfortunately it's very drying and does not provide the smooth coverage seen on the models.  It also flakes off throughout the day.

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: I love this foundation!! Color match from quiz was an exact match. Easy to apply. My skin looks nice and smooth. I got so many complements. Lasting my whole shift of wearing a mask as well. I love it!

reviews.headline: Better options
reviews.comments: Terrible, nice until you put it on your face. It settles into every single pore I have. Tried so many different combos and still just bad. Im returning asap.

reviews.headline: Pretty disappointing
reviews.comments: I knew I should have waited for some reviews before I bought this. Decent color match, a little light. It does apply nicely, it's not too dry and blends well. However, it goes downhill from there. Within minutes this sinks into every pore and line and it also looks so greasy. I have nornal to dry skin, just fyi. I tried with three primers and also without and got the same result every time.

reviews.headline: My first time
reviews.comments: Great packaging. Very moisturizing. I have combination skin and I'm still trying to figure the right skincare pairing so my oily areas don't get so shiny, but so far so good

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: This is perfect for us Indian girlies who have olive tones and oily skin. This melts into my skin like butter without it looking cakey. So happy to finally use a stick foundation that works for me!

reviews.headline: Flawless
reviews.comments: This product does not disappoint! Its so silky & lightweight its feels like your not wearing makeup but wprovides beautiful coverage using a brush or fingers to apply. It held up great in the heat so long lasting and my skin feels healthy and looks very smooth! I'm so happy I tried it :)

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: This is great product. Cant say that its really unique though. Theres so many other foundation sticks on the market. Its very little product for the price, BUT its so silky and smooth and doesnt pill or dry out. No scent. Still going to use it.
